sentences: Me sõidame ja vaatame teele, mis tormab meile vastu ja kaob me alt.
Siin pole muud, kui hakka välja alt kaevama ja kaeda edasi, kuni ots on jões.
Pillimehe sõrmede aga voolasid valsid ja polkad.
context: The word 'sõidame' is the first person plural present indicative form of the Estonian verb 'sõitama', which means 'to travel'. It specifically refers to moving from one place to another, often by vehicle. In this context, it appears in a literary quote about traveling and watching the road ahead.
